name: Lights in the Sky
description:
After a heist gone wrong, a pirate has been captured by the Chief of Police in a small idyllic tourist town.  

The pirate must escape the Chief's clutches and cross the rough, blizzard ridden waters of the sea.

An adventure story set in the early mid-century with a ton of sea-faring humor, heartfelt moments, and thrills.

Made for the WINTER VN JAM!

---
